title: Armageddon: Pick Your Plot
description: Humans are a lonely, weak species on a giant rock floating in space.Every culture and era interprets this frailty through its myths about the end of times. Truly, these disasters could strike at any moment! In Armageddon: Pick Your Plot, you are Elisabeth - a remarkable woman, destined to find herself in Death's way. Can you help Elisabeth survive the disasters awaiting her every turn? With 42 world-shattering endings, Armageddon explores our end-time prophecies and makes terrible, catastrophic and certain demise a blast!
author: A.J. Lauer
